reduceVideoSize(byte[], VideoFormats, ResizeResolution) - Method in class io.github.techgnious.IVCompressor
This method helps in converting the video content to reduced size with lower resolution.

This method helps in converting the video content to reduced size with lower resolution.
reduceVideoSizeAndSaveToAPath(File, VideoFormats, ResizeResolution, String) - Method in class io.github.techgnious.IVCompressor
This method helps in converting the video content to reduced size with lower resolution Encodes the video with default attributes thereby reducing the size of the video with better quality and stores it in the user defined path .

This method helps in converting the video content to reduced size with lower resolution Encodes the video with default attributes thereby reducing the size of the video with better quality and stores it in the user defined path .

This method is used for resizing using custom resolution but with remaining attributes as default.
